page.title: 10A SHOPPING PRECINCT A-IN-M
page.content: In the 19th century there was a pub in Gerard Street called the Gerard Arms.The pub was named after Lord Gerard, Lord Gerard owned all of Ashton, and even now his family still owns a lot of land.The Gerard arms closed in 1960, and in 1965 it became a night club.This again closed in 1970. In 1983 it was modernised and opened as a shopping precinct called {GREENSWAY}.Greensway has various shops,such as "Second to None" were you can buy clothes at reasonable prices.There is also a baby Boutique were you can buy pretty clothes for your baby.The list is almost endless, from socks, to keeping up with the chart hits of today.
